projects.name: Synopsizer 3000
projects.description: Desktop application that fetches webpage content and generates AI-powered summaries. Includes URL parsing, error handling, and a clean Tkinter UI with modular architecture.

projects.name: InstantBlog
projects.description: Dynamic blog platform with routing, templates, form handling, and responsive Bootstrap styling. Built with maintainability and readability in mind.

projects.name: Dice Game Prototype
projects.description: Modular dice-based game system with scoring, randomness, and replayability. Demonstrates object-oriented design and game-state management.
